description: This file defines a PaymentsService class for processing payments via an API and a Payment data model class. It includes methods for invoking an API endpoint to process payments and parsing the JSON response into Payment objects.

classes.name: PaymentsService
classes.description: Singleton class providing an interface to process payments through an API.

classes.name: Payment
classes.description: Data model class representing a payment object with JSON serialization.

methods.name: processPayment
methods.description: Asynchronous method to process a payment given booking ID, amount, and method; makes an API POST request and parses the response into a Payment object.

methods.name: Payment.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Payment object from a JSON map.
